directions: Bring water to a boil in a saucepan. Stir chicken, curry powder, and red pepper flakes into boiling water; cover saucepan and cook for 10 minutes. Uncover and reduce heat to low.
Gradually stir half and half into chicken mixture. Add yogurt; cook and stir until chicken is cooked through and flavors blend, 10 minutes.
ingredients: 1 boneless, skinless chicken breast half, cut into small pieces
title: Lewis' Yellow Chicken Curry
